body:
- Registering package: HssMatrices

- Release notes:
<!-- BEGIN RELEASE NOTES -->
> First release of HssMatrices.jl! HssMatrices.jl is a Julia package for working with hierarchically semi-separable (HSS) matrices. It contains, compression algorithms, arithmetic and visualisation for HSS matrices.
<!-- END RELEASE NOTES -->

title: New package: HssMatrices v0.1.1
